solvents.name: NaOH
solvents.amount: equivalent to two equivalents of L-phenylalanine

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: with deionized water and ethanol several times
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Needle-like white crystals started growing at the liquid–air interface.

characterization_techniques.UV-vis_absorption_spectroscopy: used to determine the binding stoichiometry within the spontaneous F-Zn(II) crystallization process
characterization_techniques.FTIR_spectroscopy: used to support the coordination of phenylalanine carboxylic and amino groups to Zn(ii)
characterization_techniques.SEM: used to take images of the crystals
characterization_techniques.TGA: used to confirm the high thermal stability of the complex
characterization_techniques.Powder_XRD: used to confirm that the crystal structure within the ground powder form is identical to that of the single crystals
characterization_techniques.EDS: used to identify the presence of Zn along with carbon (C) and oxygen (O) atoms
